Text: Great it's season 3! Thanks for the upload can't wait to download this once I get broadband.

This torrent had 4 seeders and 50+ leechers when I first started d/l'ing it.  It now has 4 seeders and 19 leechers.

So here's a big, truly, deeply, from the bottom of my heart, f*#k you very much to the selfish leechers.  Twats.

Much Peace, Unity, Love, and Light to you!
